name: AWS LoadBalancer to ECS Container direct relationship

statements.__comment: Cleanup: Remove stale EXPOSE relationships between LBs and containers for this account
Create: EXPOSE relationships for private containers behind internet-facing load balancers
statements.query: MATCH (aa:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(lb:AWSLoadBalancerV2 {scheme: 'internet-facing'})-[:EXPOSE]->(ip:EC2PrivateIp)<-[:PRIVATE_IP_ADDRESS]-(ni:NetworkInterface)<-[:NETWORK_INTERFACE]-(task:ECSTask)-[:HAS_CONTAINER]->(c:ECSContainer) WHERE ip.public_ip IS NULL MERGE (lb)-[r:EXPOSE]->(c) SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG, r.exposure_type = 'via_lb_only'
